memberdef.definition: typedef uint8_t(* bt_hogp_read_cb) (struct bt_hogp *hogp, struct bt_hogp_rep_info *rep, uint8_t err, const uint8_t *data)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_hogp *hogp, struct bt_hogp_rep_info *rep, uint8_t err, const uint8_t *data)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_read_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function that is called when a notification or read response is received.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called when new data related to the given report object appears. The data size can be obtained from the report object from the bt_hogp_rep_info::size field.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_hogp_write_cb) (struct bt_hogp *hogp, struct bt_hogp_rep_info *rep, uint8_t err)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_write_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function that is called when a write response is received.
Callback function that is called when the HIDS client is ready.

detaileddescription.para: When the bt_hogp_handles_assign function is called, the module starts reading all additional information it needs to work. When this process is finished, this callback function is called.

simplesect.para: bt_hogp_assign_error_cb

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_hogp_prep_fail_cb) (struct bt_hogp *hogp, int err)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_prep_fail_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function that is called when an error is detected during HIDS client preparation.

detaileddescription.para: When the bt_hogp_handles_assign function is called, the module starts reading all additional information it needs to work. If an error is detected during this process, this callback function is called.

parameterdescription.para: Negative internal error code or positive ATT error code.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_hogp_map_cb) (struct bt_hogp *hogp, uint8_t err, const uint8_t *data, size_t size, size_t offset)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_hogp *hogp, uint8_t err, const uint8_t *data, size_t size, size_t offset)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_map_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function that is called when a chunk of a report map data is received.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the data, or NULL if there is an error or no more data.
The size of the received data chunk.

briefdescription.para: Callback function that is called when the protocol mode is updated.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called when a protocol mode read or write finishes.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the HIDS client instance.

detaileddescription.para: You must call this function on the HOGP object before any other function.

simplesect.para: This function clears the whole memory occupied by the object. Do not call it on the object in use.

briefdescription.para: Assign handlers to the HIDS client instance.

detaileddescription.para: This function should be called when a link with a peer has been established, to associate the link to this instance of the module. This makes it possible to handle several links and associate each link to a particular instance of this module. The GATT attribute handles are provided by the GATT Discovery Manager.

simplesect.para: This function starts the report discovery process. Wait for one of the functions in bt_hogp_init_params before using the HIDS object.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
Special error code used when the UUID of the service does not match the expected UUID.

briefdescription.para: Release the HIDS client instance.

detaileddescription.para: This function releases all dynamic memory allocated by the HIDS client instance and clears all the instance data.

simplesect.para: Do not call this function on an instance that was not initialized (see bt_hogp_init). After the instance is initialized, it is safe to call this function multiple times.

briefdescription.para: Abort all pending transfers.

detaileddescription.para: Call this function only when the server is disconnected. Otherwise, if any read or write transfers are pending, the HOGP object might permanently return an EBUSY error on the following transfer attempts.

simplesect.para: This function disables transfers inside the HIDS client library. It does not abort any pending transfers in the Bluetooth LE stack.

briefdescription.para: Check if the assignment function was called.

parameterdescription.para: If the HIDS client has handlers assigned already.
If the HIDS client is released.

briefdescription.para: Check if the HIDS client is ready to work.

simplesect.para: If bt_hogp_assign_check returns true while this function returns false, it means that initialization is in progress.

parameterdescription.para: If the HIDS client is ready to work.
If the HIDS client is not ready.

briefdescription.para: Send a read request addressing the report value descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: This function can be used on any type of report.

parameterdescription.para: Function to be called to process the response.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_hogp *hogp, struct bt_hogp_rep_info *rep, bt_hogp_write_cb func, const void *data, uint8_t length)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_rep_write

briefdescription.para: Send a write request addressing the report value descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: Note that In reports might not support this function. In this case, this function may succeed but pass an ATT error code to the callback function.

parameterdescription.para: Function to be called to process the response.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_hogp *hogp, struct bt_hogp_rep_info *rep, const void *data, uint8_t length, bt_hogp_write_cb func)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_rep_write_wo_rsp

briefdescription.para: Send a write command addressing the report value descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: Note that in case of an error, no error response from the server is received. If the server cannot execute the command, it is just ignored.

parameterdescription.para: Function to be called when operation is completed.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Subscribe to report notifications.

detaileddescription.para: This function may be called only on Input type reports.

parameterdescription.para: Function to be called to handle the notificated value.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Remove the subscription for a selected report.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_hogp *hogp, bt_hogp_map_cb func, size_t offset, k_timeout_t timeout)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_map_read

briefdescription.para: Read part of the report map.

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a read request to the report map value. Depending on the offset, either read or read blob is sent.
The report map might not fit into a single PDU. To read the whole map, call this function repeatedly with a different offset.

simplesect.para: This function uses the common read parameters structure inside the HIDS client object. This object may be used by other functions and is protected by semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: Function to be called to process the response.
Byte offset where to start data read.
Time-out for the common read structure usage.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Read the current protocol mode from the server.

detaileddescription.para: The callback is called when a read response is received.

listitem.para: Usually, the protocol mode value is read during HIDS client preparation, and its value is followed after that. This function may be used in an error recovery situation and should not be required in normal usage.
This function uses the common read parameters structure inside the HOGP object. This object may be used by other functions and is protected by semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: Time-out for the common read structure usage.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Get the current protocol mode.

detaileddescription.para: This function returns the protocol mode stored in the HOGP object. It does not generate any traffic on the radio.

simplesect.para: Current protocol mode.

briefdescription.para: Set the current protocol mode.

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a write command to the Protocol Mode value.

simplesect.para: For the Protocol Mode value, only Write Without Response is used, so there is no control over the real Protocol Mode value if the write does not succeed.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Suspend the device.

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a SUSPEND command using the Control Point Characteristic. It should be called when the HOST enters SUSPEND state.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Exit suspend and resume.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to inform the device that the HOST exits SUSPEND state.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Get the connection object from the HIDS client.

detaileddescription.para: This function gets the connection object that is used with a given HIDS client.

simplesect.para: Connection object.

briefdescription.para: Access the HID information value.

detaileddescription.para: This function accesses the structure with the decoded HID Information Characteristic value.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the decoded HID information structure.

briefdescription.para: Access boot keyboard input report.

simplesect.para: The report pointer, or NULL if the device does not support boot keyboard protocol mode.

briefdescription.para: Access boot keyboard output report.

simplesect.para: The report pointer, or NULL if the device does not support boot keyboard protocol mode.

briefdescription.para: Access boot mouse input report.

simplesect.para: The report pointer, or NULL if the device does not support boot mouse protocol mode.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of HID reports in the device.

simplesect.para: This function does not take boot records into account. They can be accessed using separate functions.
The number of records.

briefdescription.para: Get the next report in the HOGP object.

parameterdescription.para: The record before the one to access, or NULL to access the first record.

simplesect.para: The next report according to rep, or NULL if no more reports are available.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_hogp *hogp, enum bt_hids_report_type type, uint8_t id)
memberdef.name: bt_hogp_rep_find

briefdescription.para: Find a report.

detaileddescription.para: This function searches for a report with the given type and identifier.

parameterdescription.para: The identifier to find. Note that valid identifiers start from 1, but the value 0 may be used for devices that have one report of each type and there is no report ID inside the report map.

simplesect.para: The report that was found, or NULL.

briefdescription.para: Set user data in report.
Get user data from report.

simplesect.para: User data pointer.

briefdescription.para: Get report identifier.

simplesect.para: Report identifier.

briefdescription.para: Get report type.

simplesect.para: Report type.

briefdescription.para: Get report size.

simplesect.para: You can rely on this function after completing the read procedure for your target HID report with the bt_hogp_rep_read API. The completion is reported by the appropriate callback. Alternatively, you can subscribe to your target report with bt_hogp_rep_subscribe API and start using the function below once you receive the first notification. In all other cases, the size information is not available.
The size of the report or 0 if not available.
